      protected void startActivityForResult(android.content.Intent intent, int code)
      Start an activity.

    • Method Detail

      • startActivityForResult

        protected void startActivityForResult(android.content.Intent intent,
                          int code)
        Description copied from class: IntentIntegrator
        Start an activity.
        This method is defined to allow different methods of activity starting for newer versions of Android and for compatibility library.
        Overrides:
        startActivityForResult in class IntentIntegrator
        Parameters:
        intent - Intent to start.
        code - Request code for the activity
        See Also:
        Activity.startActivityForResult(Intent, int), Fragment.startActivityForResult(Intent, int)
